## Gesture.getCurrentDragger() method

Gets the current dragger if an item is being dragged. Null if nothing is being dragged.  The dragger that is currently in use or null if no drag is in progress.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getCurrentDragger(): WorkspaceDragger | BubbleDragger | IBlockDragger | null;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

[WorkspaceDragger](./blockly.workspacedragger.md) \| [BubbleDragger](./blockly.bubbledragger.md) \| [IBlockDragger](./blockly.iblockdragger.md) \| null
